params.tokenContractAddress: the address of the ERC1155 NFT contract
params.tokenIds: The token ids of the nfts

params.tokenContractAddresses: the addresses of the ERC20 token contracts

params.target: The target contract address whose method needs to be called
params.value: The amount of Ether to be sent

params.tokenContractAddress: the address of the ERC1155 NFT contract
params.tokenId: The token id of the nft

params.tokenContractAddress: the address of the ERC721 NFT contract
params.tokenId: The token id of the nft

params.tokenContractAddress: the address of the erc20 token contract

params._autoFlush1155: Whether to automatically flush ERC1155 tokens or not
params._autoFlush721: Whether to automatically flush ERC721 tokens or not
params._feeAddress: Address which is allowed to call methods on this contract alongwith the parentAddress
params._parentAddress: Address to which the funds should be forwarded

params._tokenId: The token id of the nft
params.data: Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

batchFlushERC1155Tokens(address,uint256[.notice: Execute a batch nft transfer from the forwarder to the parent address.

batchFlushERC20Tokens(address[]).notice: Execute a batch erc20 transfer from the forwarder to the parent address.

callFromParent(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Method to allow for calls to other contracts. This method can only be called by the parent address

feeAddress().notice: Address which is allowed to call methods on this contract alongwith the parentAddress

flush().notice: Flush the entire balance of the contract to the parent address.

flushERC1155Tokens(address,uint256).notice: Execute a nft transfer from the forwarder to the parent address.

flushERC721Token(address,uint256).notice: Execute a nft transfer from the forwarder to the parent address

flushTokens(address).notice: Execute a token transfer of the full balance from the forwarder to the parent address

init(address,address,bool,bool).notice: Initialize the contract, and sets the destination address to that of the parent address

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: ERC721 standard callback function for when a ERC721 is transfered. The forwarder will send the nft to the base wallet once the nft contract invokes this method after transfering the nft.

parentAddress().notice: Any funds sent to this contract will be forwarded to this address
